mapper.insert: insert into train (train_num,train_no, from_name,to_name, price, num,from_time, to_time, from_date,to_date) values (#{trainNum},#{trainNo}, #{fromName},#{toName}, #{price}, #{num},#{fromTime}, #{toTime}, #{fromDate},#{toDate})
mapper.select: select * from train where train_num = #{trainNum} and from_name = #{fromName} and to_name = #{toName} and from_date = #{fromDate}
mapper.update: update train set num = #{num} where train_num = #{trainNum} and from_name = #{fromName} and to_name = #{toName} and from_date = #{fromDate}
